title: Prototypes | Semantic Scholar
markdown:
# Prototypes | Semantic Scholar

October 2023

Topic Pages Beta

Topic pages aim to help you explore a specific topic of interest by collecting AI-generated definitions, papers often cited for each topic, and related topics. This is a work-in-progress prototype.

[Learn more](https://topics-beta.apps.semanticscholar.org/)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/605236bb767e9a5bb229c63c/609adda9bd029148c37023a9_webclip.png)

July 2023

Bridger

Bridger is a project focused on facilitating discovery of scholars and their work, by locating commonalities and contrasts between scientists.

[Learn more](https://bridger.apps.allenai.org/)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/605236bb767e9a5bb229c63c/6529ad5a9a8da6be3069f1a9_Brider%20logo.svg)

January 2022

COVID-19 Challenges & Directions

Explore our index of fine-grained difficulties, limitations, uncertainties and hypotheses, initial signals and future directions, automatically extracted from over 500,000 COVID-19 papers.

[Learn more](https://challenges.apps.allenai.org/)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/605236bb767e9a5bb229c63c/6529b41213ed5242e031843c_covid%20search%20engine.svg)

September 2021

Paper to HTML Converter

Paper to HTML aims to render scientific papers in HTML so they can be more easily read by screen readers or on mobile devices. You can upload a scientific paper or view a gallery of example papers.

[Learn more](https://papertohtml.org/)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/605236bb767e9a5bb229c63c/652ed7c261fd36fea0a47887_paper2html.png)

September 2020

SciSight

SciSight is a tool for exploring the evolving network of science in the COVID-19 Open Research Dataset. Use SciSight to find out what groups are working on what directions, see how biomedical concepts interact and evolve over time, and discover new connections.

[Learn more](https://scisight.apps.allenai.org/)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/605236bb767e9a5bb229c63c/6529c01979cbf4ed07487a4b_scisight.svg)

July 2020

Supp.AI

SUPP.AI automatically extracts evidence of supplement and drug interactions from the scientific literature. Search for all known potential interactions with a particular agent, or look up the evidence for a specific interaction.

[Learn more](https://supp.ai/)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/605236bb767e9a5bb229c63c/60d0eb8d0f99808b93adc50c_download.svg)

Semantic Scholar Research

Accelerating scientific breakthroughs by helping scholars discover and understand scientific literature

PublicationsResearchersCareersPrototypesResources

Our Work

Semantic Scholar Research Prototypes

Our team of world-class researchers is dedicated to studying information overload and developing groundbreaking AI-powered tools to overcome it. Here are some innovative prototypes built by our researchers that help us shape our product.

October 2023

Topic Pages Beta

Topic pages aim to help you explore a specific topic of interest by collecting AI-generated definitions, papers often cited for each topic, and related topics. This is a work-in-progress prototype.

Learn more

July 2023

Bridger is a project focused on facilitating discovery of scholars and their work, by locating commonalities and contrasts between scientists.

Learn more

Explore our index of fine-grained difficulties, limitations, uncertainties and hypotheses, initial signals and future directions, automatically extracted from over 500,000 COVID-19 papers.

Learn more

Paper to HTML Converter

Paper to HTML aims to render scientific papers in HTML so they can be more easily read by screen readers or on mobile devices. You can upload a scientific paper or view a gallery of example papers.

Learn more

SciSight

SciSight is a tool for exploring the evolving network of science in the COVID-19 Open Research Dataset. Use SciSight to find out what groups are working on what directions, see how biomedical concepts interact and evolve over time, and discover new connections.

Learn more

July 2020

Supp.AI

SUPP.AI automatically extracts evidence of supplement and drug interactions from the scientific literature. Search for all known potential interactions with a particular agent, or look up the evidence for a specific interaction.

What Is Semantic Scholar?

Semantic Scholar is a free, AI-powered research tool for scientific literature, based at Ai2.
